attributes.action: Call a General Election now as we the public have NO Confidence in any sitting MP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
as members of the public we do not want mps saying they are sorry but we have worked within the rules now that they have been found out,the ruels where made by you the mps and you have shown you cannot be given this job,and so we want them to be put up for re election or prosecution for fraud the same as anyone else in the country would be if they had done this.
and so we the people as your employer demands that this parliment is disolved and a general election called.
and at the same time an independent forum of normal people not lords or sirs, go through your rules and lay a new set down which the new mps will have to abide by.this could be done in less than 4 weeks as the normal people have to live on a lot less than you do.
what you must understand is that you are there for the people not yourself, if this does not fit in with what you want then do not stand for the job.
and do not say we will get what we pay for as we have gone down this road already and look where that as got us.
we need this done now not in 2,4 or 6 months.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
